string.name: lyrics
string.br: I\'m a ************ train wreck \n
I don\'t wanna be too much \n
But I don\'t wanna miss your touch \n
And you don\'t seem to give a **** \n
I don\'t wanna keep you waiting \n
But I do just what I have to do \n
And I might not be the one for you \n
But you ain\'t allowed to have no boo \n
\n
Cause I know we be so complicated \n
But we be so *******, it\'s crazy \n
I can\'t have what I want, but neither can you \n
\n
You ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to see nobody else \n
And I don\'t want you to see nobody \n
But you ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to touch nobody else \n
Baby, we ain\'t gotta tell nobody \n
\n
Even though you ain\'t mine, I promise the way we fight \n
Make me honestly feel like we just in love \n
Cause, baby, when push comes to shove \n
Damn, baby, I\'m a train wreck, too (Too) \n
I lose my mind when it comes to you \n
I take time with the ones I choose \n
And I don\'t want a smile if it ain\'t from you, yeah \n
\n
I know we be so complicated \n
Lovin you sometimes drive me crazy \n
Cause I can\'t have what I want and neither can you \n
\n
You ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to see nobody else \n
And I don\'t want you to see nobody \n
But you ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to touch nobody else \n
Baby, we ain\'t gotta tell nobody \n
\n
I wanna kiss you (Yeah), don\'t wanna miss you (Yeah) \n
But I can\'t be with you cause I got issues \n
Yeah, on the surface, seem like it\'s easy \n
Careful with words, but it\'s still hard to read me \n
Stress high when the trust low (Mmm) \n
Bad vibes, where\'d the fun go? (Oh) \n
Try to open up and love more (Love more) \n
Try to open up and love more \n
\n
If you were my boyfriend \n
And you were my girlfriend \n
I prolly wouldn\'t see nobody else \n
But I can\'t guarantee that by myself \n
\n
You ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend, you ain\'t my boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend, I ain\'t your girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to see nobody else (Nobody) \n
And I don\'t want you to see nobody \n
But you ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend, you know you ain\'t my boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend, yeah, mmm) \n
But you don\'t want me to touch nobody else (Nobody) \n
Baby, we ain\'t gotta tell nobody (Oh yeah) \n
You ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend) \n
But you don\'t want me to see nobody else \n
And I don\'t want you to see nobody \n
But you ain\'t my boyfriend (Boyfriend) \n
And I ain\'t your girlfriend (Girlfriend, yeah) \n
But you don\'t want me to touch nobody else (Nobody) \n
Baby, we ain\'t gotta tell nobody \n
